sentences.en: A mother's suppression of her own feelings can cause problems.
sentences.cn: 母亲压抑自己的情感会产生问题。

sentences.en: Able to effectively remove dandruff and itchy scalp suppression.
sentences.cn: 能够有效地去除头屑及抑制头皮发痒.

sentences.en: Biological control is an ecologically sound approach to pest suppression.
sentences.cn: 生物防治是一种生态学上的很好解决为害物的方法.

sentences.en: Eye problems can indicate an unhealthy lifestyle with subsequent suppression of the immune system.
sentences.cn: 患眼疾可能表明生活方式不健康，而且免疫系统同时受到抑制。

sentences.en: Ferrite cores are effective in electromagnetic noise suppression and shielding.
sentences.cn: 电磁圈能有效的屏蔽和抑压电磁的干扰.

sentences.en: He bore a part in the suppression of opium - smoking.
sentences.cn: 他参与禁烟(禁抽鸦片的)运动.

sentences.en: He has retrograde amnesia, acute psychological suppression.
sentences.cn: -他得了逆行性健忘症, 急性心理压抑.

sentences.en: Readers familiar with English history will find a vague parallel to the suppression of the monasteries.
sentences.cn: 熟悉英国历史的读者会发现这与镇压修道院略有相似之处。

sentences.en: Suppression is called intragenic when both mutations are within the same gene.
sentences.cn: 两个突变发生在同一基因内的抑制,叫基因内抑制.

sentences.en: Suppression of encapsulation is by reducing blood cells responsible for encapsulation.
sentences.cn: 通过减少负责包囊作用的血细胞而使包囊作用受到抑制.

sentences.en: Suppression of the truth is the expression of what is false.
The performances of coherent interference suppression are analyzed in detail.
sentences.cn: 对抵消相干干扰的性能做了详细的分析.

sentences.en: The Smart Fog MS 100 Fogger is the solution for optimal dust suppression.
sentences.cn: 智能雾MS100烟雾机是最佳的尘埃的解决方案.

sentences.en: Water may also be used for dust suppression in the dry weather.
sentences.cn: 在干燥天气里水也可以用以控制粉尘.

words.tran_cn: 制止的；抑制性的；遏抑的
镇压，禁止（suppress的过去时和过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 粉尘消除；除尘措施；粉尘抑制
